meanings.definition: A small, inflamed swelling of the skin, typically caused by acne.
meanings.sent1: She was self-conscious about the zits on her face.
meanings.sent2: He tried a new cream to clear up his zits.
meanings.sent3: The zits seemed to have a party on her forehead.
meanings.sent4: Her face looked like a constellation of zits.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reflected back her zits in harsh light.

meanings.sent1: He tends to zits when he's stressed.
meanings.sent3: The way he zits before a date is amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her skin zits like a volcano before exams.
meanings.sent5: The stress makes him zits like crazy.
